At the Oteybis's city section, Hellpeon walks having entered it 
somehow without seeing one IGL guy. This could be because KSL didnt 
see the last IGL post, but oh well not like hes attacking anything 
yet. He soon comes to a large weapons store and smirks before walking 
in. Upon entering he looks to the shopkeeper. His eyes glowing a dark 
red.

Hellpeon: "Where are your most powerful weapons?"
